item.title: one in love lyrics by a1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Have you seen the sunset, fade beneath a rain cloud? Have you ever chased your dreams away? Did you ever think that? Life was just a highway, a never-ending road of lonely days. There are times we cry, and reach out to the sky. For the strength we need, to hold our head up high. […]
